# Omics2Surv

**Omics2Surv** is an R package for **survival analysis with multi-omics
data**.

## üì¶ Package overview

**Omics2Surv** is designed to:

- Handle heterogeneous multi-omics datasets

- Support multiple integration strategies:

\- None (single-omics modeling)

\- Early integration

\- Late integration

\- Joint / cooperative models

- Store all data in a standardized MultiAssayExperiment objects

- Enable fair model comparison using concordance index (C-index)

## Supported modeling strategies

1.  **Single-omics, early and late integration** models:

- Cox LASSO
- Cox Elastic Net
- Cox Adaptive LASSO
- Penalized AFT models

2.  **Joint integration** models:

- CoopCox (Cooperative Cox regression)
- AFTCoop (Cooperative AFT regression)
- blockForest (Random Forest)
- flexynesis (Python-based deep learning survival framework)

## Installation

You can install **Omics2Surv** from GitHub:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("FraCalanca/Omics2Surv")
```

## üèõ Funding

This work is supported by the PRIN 2022 PNRR P2022BLN38
project,¬†Computational approaches for the integration of multi-omics
data¬†funded by European Union - Next Generation EU, CUP¬†B53D23027810001.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`J_models()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/J_models.md)
  : Train and Test Joint Multi-Omics Models
- [`L_pen_regression_models()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/L_pen_regression_models.md)
  : Late Integration of Penalized Regression Models Across Multiple
  Omics Layers
- [`LinkedOmicsLikeData`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/LinkedOmicsLikeData.md)
  : LinkedOmics-like data format
- [`S_or_E_pen_regression_models()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/S_or_E_pen_regression_models.md)
  : Single or Early Integration Penalized Regression Models
- [`build_MAE()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/build_MAE.md)
  : Build a MultiAssayExperiment Object from Omics Data
- [`dichotomize_risk_groups()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/dichotomize_risk_groups.md)
  : Dichotomize Continuous Risk Scores into High and Low Risk Groups
- [`early_integration()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/early_integration.md)
  : Early Integration of Multiple Omics Layers
- [`filter_common_patients()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/filter_common_patients.md)
  : Filter Omics Data to Retain Only Common Samples Across All Layers
- [`late_integration()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/late_integration.md)
  : Late Integration of Multi-Omics Survival Predictions
- [`prepare_CNV_SE()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/prepare_CNV_SE.md)
  : Prepare Copy Number Variation Data as SummarizedExperiment
- [`prepare_custom_data()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/prepare_custom_data.md)
  : Prepare custom data in LinkedOmics-like format
- [`prepare_design_matrix()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/prepare_design_matrix.md)
  : Prepare Design Matrix from MultiAssayExperiment for Modeling
- [`prepare_mRNA_SE()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/prepare_mRNA_SE.md)
  : Prepare mRNA Expression Data as SummarizedExperiment
- [`prepare_methyl_SE()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/prepare_methyl_SE.md)
  : Prepare Methylation Data as SummarizedExperiment
- [`prepare_surv_data()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/prepare_surv_data.md)
  : Prepare Survival Data from MultiAssayExperiment
- [`retrieve_linkedomics_data()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/retrieve_linkedomics_data.md)
  : Retrieve LinkedOmics Data from TCGA
- [`run_joint_models()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/run_joint_models.md)
  : Run Joint Multi-Omics Survival Models
- [`run_model_comparison_pipeline()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/run_model_comparison_pipeline.md)
  : Run Model Comparison Pipeline for Multi-Omics Survival Analysis
- [`run_penalized_regression_models()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/run_penalized_regression_models.md)
  : Run Penalized Regression Models with Multi-Omics Integration
- [`split_train_test()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/split_train_test.md)
  : Split Data into Training and Testing Sets
- [`test_AFTCoop()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/test_AFTCoop.md)
  : Test AFT Cooperative Learning Model
- [`test_blockForest()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/test_blockForest.md)
  : Test Block Random Forest Model
- [`test_cooplearning()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/test_cooplearning.md)
  : Test Cooperative Learning Model
- [`test_cox_glmnet()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/test_cox_glmnet.md)
  : Evaluate Cox GLMNET Model on Test Data
- [`train_AFTCoop()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/train_AFTCoop.md)
  : Train AFT Cooperative Learning Model
- [`train_blockForest()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/train_blockForest.md)
  : Train Block Random Forest for Survival Analysis
- [`train_cooplearning()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/train_cooplearning.md)
  : Train Cooperative Learning Model for Multi-Omics Survival Analysis
- [`train_cox_glmnet_ElasticNet()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/train_cox_glmnet_ElasticNet.md)
  : Train a Cox Elastic Net Model with Alpha Optimization
- [`train_cox_glmnet_LASSO()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/train_cox_glmnet_LASSO.md)
  : Train a Cox LASSO Model with Cross-Validation
- [`train_cox_glmnet_adaptiveLASSO()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/train_cox_glmnet_adaptiveLASSO.md)
  : Train an Adaptive Cox LASSO Model
- [`train_penAFT()`](https://fracalanca.github.io/Omics2Surv/reference/train_penAFT.md)
  : Train a Penalized Accelerated Failure Time (AFT) Model
